name: The Turning Tower
description:
In this game, you'll climb the Turning Tower, a puzzling pillar filled with levers and shifting platforms. Can you make it to the top? Only one way to find out!

Use WASD to move, H and K to operate switches

Made in one week from Dec 23 - 29, 2018. 

Known issue: If you maximize, the desktop versions, it will reset the window size between levels. This doesn't specifically affect gameplay, just makes you remaximize the window.
